item.title: Report X-2024110102
item.description:
Report X-2024110102

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-07T12:22:36+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-04
  • City: NEWARK
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 11/3/2024 at approximately 2145, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 435751 at the ramp facility in Newark, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment consisted of 3 glass bottles, each containing 8 oz of liquid, packaged in one fiberboard box. Due to human error, the shipment began to feel damp. Further investigation revealed that one of the bottles had broken, resulting in spillage. The damaged bottle was placed in a salvage drum for disposal and the remaining shipment was placed in a separate drum and awaits an amended Shipper's declaration for further transport.

  • Description: On 10/25/2024 this shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the DHL NJS Service Center, 1240 Forest Parkway, Suite 400, West Deptford, NJ 08066. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3481 Lithium ion batteries contained in equipment Class 9 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Case Material of Construction: Plastic Package Capacity: 130 g Amount in Package: 130 g Number in Shipment: 4 Number Failed: 4

item.title: Report I-2024100148
item.description:
Report I-2024100148

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-21
  • City: Elizabeth
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/21/2024 hidden dangerous goods were discovered during the shipment inspection process at the DHL ELZ Service Center, 15-31 Papetti Plaza, Elizabeth, NJ 07206. Transportation by road has been confirmed. Shipment also contains UN3481 Lithium ion batteries contained in equipment UN1950 Aerosols, flammable Class 9 Class 2.1 Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Single Package or Inner Packaging(if any): Packaging Type: Case Packaging Type: Receptacle Material of Construction: Plastic Material of Construction: Metal Package Capacity: 189 g Package Capacity: 227 g Amount in Package: 189 Amount in Package: 227 g Number in Shipment 1 Number in Shipment 2 Number Failed: 1- Number Failed: 2
